main.name: Jorge Ochoa-Reyes
main.bio: I enjoy programming and am excited to always learn new technologies! I love to create products quickly using firebase, and then evolve those into full stack projects using technologies I enjoy like graphql.
main.contactmessage: Best way to contact me would be email!, I check it daily, otherwise phone works as well.

education.description: Computer Sciene Club Officer, and Google Developers Club Vice President

work.years: Technology: Firestore, Firebase Functions, AuthO React.js
work.description: Worked towards devloping a in house built sales dashboard, a live-prep-dashboard for efficiency in the kitchen, and improve landing website for Noshery.

work.years: Technology: Next.js, URQL, Graphql, Apollo, Typeorm, Postgresql, and Redis.
work.description: Resumelinks are the linktree of resumes, easily store and access your resume.

A virtual reality project where I created and tested 3 different virtual reality keyboard layouts with 4 different control modalities (head pointer, hand pointer, touch control, and dwell time head pointer)
Official website for the CSU Fresno Computer Science Club. Contains events information, projects created by the club, and information on the currecnt officers.

research.title: Evaluation of a Tree-based Menu Virtual Keyboard in Fully Immersive Virtual Reality
research.abstract: Results: There exist a significant difference between the two virtual keyboards (VK1: standard qwerty layout, VK2: tree-based menu layout), with VK1 taking less time per command ratio than VK2, but found no significant difference between the keyboards regarding workload and usability.

projects.title: NASA Minds Artemis/VRI
projects.category: VR Keyboard Layouts and different control modalities.

projects.category: Short simple links for storing resumes.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
